intro: Solanum supranitidum, commonly known as the silverleaf nightshade, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a shrub that typically grows in humid, tropical environments. The plant features small, white or pale green flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are usually shiny and have a distinctive silvery or pale underside. Solanum supranitidum belongs to the nightshade family, Solanaceae, which includes other plants like tomatoes and potatoes.
